title: Initial Release
summary: Crawlix launches with 134+ SEO checks, high-performance crawling, and privacy-first architecture.

changes.title: High-Performance Crawler Engine
changes.description: CrawlerV2 with HTTP/2 multiplexing, connection pooling, Bloom filter deduplication, and batch database writes. 10x throughput improvement.

changes.title: 134+ SEO Checks
changes.description: Comprehensive analysis across 11 categories: Technical SEO, On-Page, Content Quality, Links, Images, Structured Data, Security, Accessibility, and International SEO.

changes.title: Technical SEO Analysis
changes.description: 20+ checks: status codes, soft 404 detection, canonicals, redirect chains, HTTPS, URL structure, and crawl depth.

changes.title: Local SQLite Database
changes.description: All crawl data stored locally in SQLite. Your data never leaves your machine. Export anytime.

changes.title: CSV & JSON Export
changes.description: Export pages, issues, links, and resources to CSV or JSON for further analysis.

changes.title: Memory-Efficient Streaming
changes.description: URL frontier with configurable size (default 100K URLs). Bloom filter prevents duplicate crawling with O(1) lookups.
